name: codealive-skills (CodeAlive-AI)
description: [项目级] Agent skills for CodeAlive — semantic code search and AI-powered codebase answers. Works with Claude Code, Codex, Antigravity, Cursor, OpenCode, Copilot, Windsurf, Gemini CLI, and other SKILL.md-compatible agents.。来源: https://github.com/CodeAlive-AI/codealive-skills

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Agent skills for CodeAlive — semantic code search and AI-powered codebase answers. Works with Claude Code, Codex, Antigravity, Cursor, OpenCode, Copilot, Windsurf, Gemini CLI, and other SKILL.md-compatible agents.

来源: https://github.com/CodeAlive-AI/codealive-skills
语言: Python
Stars: 4

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: > **Claude Code users:** the recommended installation method is [Option 2 (Plugin)](#option-2-claude-code-plugin) — it includes the skill plus authentication hooks and a code exploration subagent.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
agents
agents/codealive-code-explorer.md
hooks
hooks/hooks.json
hooks/scripts
skills
skills/codealive-context-engine

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
Start your agent and ask naturally:

- *"How is authentication implemented?"*
- *"Show me error handling patterns across services"*
- *"Find similar features to guide my implementation"*

No special commands needed — the agent picks up the skill automatically.

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content: Agent skills and Claude Code plugin for [CodeAlive](https://app.codealive.ai) — install via [skills.sh](https://skills.sh/) or as a Claude Code plugin.
